Tabletop RPGs.name: Fluxfall Horizon Random Generators
Tabletop RPGs.description: Random generators for Fluxfall Horizon, a PbtA game by Dave Thaumavore

Tabletop RPGs.name: Across a Thousand Dead Worlds - Data
Tabletop RPGs.description: A data repository for Across a Thousand Dead Worlds by Blackoath Entertainment

Tabletop RPGs.name: Central Supply Catalog
Tabletop RPGs.description: The Central Supply Catalog, inspired by the 1970s Traveller SFRPG, has evolved over time; this app aims to support and give back to its dedicated community.

Tabletop RPGs.name: Mythic Space Sector Generator
Tabletop RPGs.description: A random sector generator for the Mythic Space TTRPG by LaCara Games

Tabletop RPGs.name: Savage Worlds Dice Roller
Tabletop RPGs.description: Inspired by the former Savage Worlds Dice Roller app, this web-based tool rolls dice and counts raises above the Target Number.

Tabletop RPGs.name: Savage Worlds Raise Calculator
Tabletop RPGs.description: Determine your raises quickly after a roll.

Tabletop RPGs.name: Fantasy Companion Treasure Generator
Tabletop RPGs.description: Crafted from the treasure tables in the Savage Worlds Fantasy Companion.

VTT Addons.name: SWADE Item Tables
VTT Addons.description: SWADE Item Tables is a FoundryVTT module displaying Savage Worlds items in table format, allowing direct viewing and dragging to the Actor's sheet.

VTT Addons.name: Card Hands List
VTT Addons.description: Card Hands List is a system-neutral Foundry VTT module, offering quick access to owned Card Hands via a collapsible list integrated seamlessly with the core UI.

VTT Addons.name: Ghosts I-IV by Nine Inch Nails
VTT Addons.description: Ghosts I-IV is a Nine Inch Nails atmospheric audio collection from 2008, offered as a module with a playlist and liner notes, ideal for enhancing RPGs with its diverse, ambient moods.
